bibl.title: A Computer Aid of Restoring Letters in Papyri.
bibl.note: An article with exact informations and illustrations of the method is planned for SymbOsl.

bibl.title: Atti del XVII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. I

bibl.seg: Kleve Knut and Espen Smith Ore, A Computer Aid of Restoring Letters in Papyri.
Atti del XVII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. I (Napoli, 1984) pp. 155-156.
An article with exact informations and illustrations of the method is planned for SymbOsl.
